description:
Zoro and Sanji look back on their friends’ battles against the Tobi Roppo, the top officers of the Animal Kingdom Pirates. They describe how hard Nami, Robin, and the others fought to defeat the formidable enemies.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Combats acharnés. L`équipage du chapeau de paille contre les Tobi Roppo !
Dai Gekisen Tokushuu! Mugiwara no Ichimi vs Tobi Roppou
Recapping Fierce Fights! Straw Hats vs. Tobi Roppo
Zusammenfassung der heftigen Kämpfe! – Die Strohhüte vs. die Sechs Überflieger
大激戦特集! 麦わらの一味VS飛び六胞
